FindRespones: Find answers to common inquiries about the marketplace, selling process, and buying experience here.
HowDo: How do I start selling on the marketplace?
startingIsSimple: Getting started is simple! Create an account, set up your seller profile with information about your craft and brand, and then list your products with high-quality photos and detailed descriptions. Our seller dashboard will guide you through each step of the process.
WhatFees: What fees are there for sellers?
WeCharge: We charge a 5% fee on each sale, plus a small $0.20 listing fee per item. There are no monthly subscription fees or hidden charges. Payment processing fees (typically 3% + $0.25) are processed separately through our secure payment processor.
SellersAre: Sellers are responsible for shipping their products to buyers. You can set your own shipping rates or use our shipping calculators. We offer discounted shipping label services, and you can track all shipments directly from our platform.
WeOffer: We offer comprehensive buyer protection covering purchases from order to delivery. If an item doesn't arrive or significantly differs from its description, buyers can request a refund. We also have a secure messaging system for direct communication between buyers and sellers.
Okyoucan: Yes! You can sell digital products such as patterns, prints, digital art, etc. Our platform supports automatic delivery of digital files after purchase, making it convenient for both sellers and buyers.
getFeat: How can I get featured on the marketplace?
Weregulary: We regularly feature sellers and outstanding products on our homepage, social media, and marketing materials. Quality photos, detailed descriptions, excellent customer service, and positive reviews all increase your chances of being featured. We also have a dedicated team that curates collections and highlights exceptional artisans.
whether: Whether you're a seller looking to showcase your creations or a buyer searching for unique items, our platform makes the process easy.

aboutText: Ҳунари ман was born out of a love for authentic craftsmanship and a desire to connect talented artisans with people who value handmade items. Founded in 2025, we've grown from a small community of local artisans to a major marketplace offering thousands of unique items from around the world.
WhyDoThis: Why We Do What We Do
weBelieve: We believe that traditional crafts should be preserved while embracing innovation. Our mission is to create a sustainable marketplace where artisans can thrive and customers can discover unique and high-quality handcrafted items that tell stories.
WeProvide: We provide a platform for talented artisans to showcase their work and earn a fair income.
everyItems: Every item on our marketplace is carefully selected to ensure high quality and craftsmanship.
Weconnetc: We connect artisans and customers from around the world, embracing diverse cultural traditions.
passionatePeople: The passionate people behind Ҳунари ман who work tirelessly to support our community of artisans and customers.
atCraftMarket: At Ҳунари ман, we are guided by core values that shape everything we do. We believe in authenticity, sustainability, and the power of human creativity.
wecelebrate: We celebrate authentic craftsmanship and the stories behind each creation.
WePromote: We promote environmentally friendly practices and responsible consumption.
wefosterConnect: We foster connection between creators and buyers from around the world.
hearFrom: Hear from our community of artisans and customers.
hasTransformed: Ҳунари ман has transformed my childhood dream into a successful business. The platform's support and the community's appreciation for handmade work have been amazing.
IloveShopping: I love shopping at Ҳунари ман because each item belongs to a person and is created with respect. The quality is amazing, and I appreciate knowing the story behind my purchase
whetheryoure: Whether you're a skilled artisan looking to share your creations or a customer searching for unique handcrafted items, we welcome you to our growing community.
